metadata.synopsis: If players agreed to help Hope, she will show the road to her Prison and ask to follow her.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Steal the Hammer through debug book3. teleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_ArchiveGuide01Trigger

0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HouseOfHope_Hope
0.text: Hush hush. Quiet as quicksand, if you please.

3.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HouseOfHope_Hope
3.context: NodeContext: in a very loud whisper

1.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HouseOfHope_Hope
1.text: I think I guess I hope I'm right my prison is just on the right.

2.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HouseOfHope_Hope
2.text: Almost there. I'm so excited I could scream.
2.context: NodeContext: trying to hold her excitement in

4.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HouseOfHope_Hope
4.text: Just across the hall, if you don't mind.

5.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HouseOfHope_Hope
5.text: Did you get distracted? Me too. BY THE TEETH IN MY ARTERIES.
5.context: NodeContext: first part she's being very understanding of the player's apparent confusion - then blurting out the horrible fact about her own suffering
